definitions.title: coll. swarmers, swarming things
definitions.body: ;—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Le 11:29 +, [[שָָׁרֶץ]] v:Le 11:31; cstr. v:Le 11:20 +;—swarming things (HD and P), aquatic Ge 1:20, Le 11:10; small reptiles and quadrupeds Ge 7:21 (+ [[עוֹךָ]], [[בְּהֵמָה]], [[חַיָּה]]), Le 5:2 (+ [[חַיָּה]], [[בְּהֵמָה]]), Le 11:29 (weasel, mouse, lizard), v:Le 11:31, v:Le 11:41, v:Le 11:42, v:Le 11:43 (c. cogn. [[שָׁרַץ]]), v:Le 11:44, cf. Le 22:5; insects, [[הָעוֹךָ]] ´[[שׁ]]: De 14:19, + [[הַהׂלֵח עַל־אַרְעַ]] Le 11:20, Le 11:21, cf. v:Le 11:23. cf. v:Le 11:23, . Cf. Dr:DB i. 519.
